rows: The unique ID of the client. Retrieved while setting Okta up.
The URL of the identity provider’s single sign-on. For Okta, this is usuallyhttps://okta.com/qmBNBnkAkopZXwJpjpu5/sso/saml.
The URL of the identity provider’s single sign-off. For Okta, this is usuallyhttps://test-site.okta.com/app/test-site_creatio_1/qmBNBnkAkopZXwJpjpu5/sso/saml.
html:
Parameter

Parameter Value

IdP Issuer

The unique ID of the client. Retrieved while setting Okta up.

SingleSignOnServiceUrl

The URL of the identity provider’s single sign-on. For Okta, this is usually https://okta.com/qmBNBnkAkopZXwJpjpu5/sso/saml.

SingleLogoutServiceUrl

The URL of the identity provider’s single sign-off. For Okta, this is usually https://test-site.okta.com/app/test-site_creatio_1/qmBNBnkAkopZXwJpjpu5/sso/saml.
